name: Joules Journey
description:
NOTE: This game struggles a bit if you click out of the play window, or click full screen. Please restart the game if controls aren't working.

Controls

Jump - SPACE

Throw object/enemy - X or J

Move - <-- --> Arrow Keys or A and D

Quick Level Restart - R

Programming, Design: Daniel Skogly @poacher2k

Art, Animation, Design: Meeka Elliott - Instagram | Twitter

Music, Sound Effects: Chris Sensebe - @Sensasaur
